sanskrit_verse:
क्षत्रियो बाहुवीर्येण तरेदापदमात्मनः ।
धनेन वैश्यशूद्रौ तु जपहोमैर्द्विजोत्तमः ॥ ११.३४॥
transliteration:
kṣatriyo bāhuvīreṇa tared āpadam ātmanaḥ |
dhanena vaiśyaśūdrau tu japahomair dvijottamaḥ || 11.34||
sph_interpretive_translation: The Kshatriya transcends personal crisis through valor of arm; the Vaishya and Shudra through wealth, while the Dwija-srestha through mantra and fire ritual.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is determined by svadharma-specific capacity for conscious action.
Causation aligns with ontological role rather than external moral valuation.
Capacity-based responsibility flows from varna-dharma, not punitive attribution.
Restoration logic operates through re-alignment to inherent dharma-function.
Consciousness alignment occurs via execution of svadharma in crisis.
executable_legal_axioms: IF actor = KSHATRIYA AND crisis_occurs THEN enable valor-response mechanism.
IF actor IN [VAISHYA, SHUDRA] AND crisis_occurs THEN activate wealth-utilization protocol.
IF actor = DWIJA_SHRESTHA AND crisis_occurs THEN initiate japa-homa restoration sequence.
ALL actors MUST engage capacity-appropriate response aligned with svadharma.
NO punitive evaluation of response efficacy allowed—only functional alignment checked.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme adjudication, threshold of responsibility lies in identification of svadharma-role during crisis. Authority hierarchy reflects dharma-capacity, not social rank. Restoration prioritizes realignment over retribution, ensuring constitutional embodiment of varna-functional integrity.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana-based causality recognizes that crisis resolution manifests through svadharma-exclusive means. Anupurvasah shows sequential unfolding of appropriate response modalities. Responsibility is proportional to capacity-defined function. Non-punitive reality rule affirms that misalignment dissolves upon correct dharmic activation.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate svadharma-reaffirmation process based on varna-specific capability mapping.
Deploy valor-enablement framework for Kshatriyas facing existential threat.
Activate economic-stabilization protocol for Vaishyas and Shudras under duress.
Engage mantra-fire purification cycle for Dwija-sresthas undergoing spiritual disruption.
Verify completion of consciousness-reintegration through svadharma-performance audit.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this verse executes as pure Dharma-law. Crisis-resolution pathways are ordained by svadharma, not punitive design. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth. Dharma is restored.
